name: One Jump Ninja
description:
One Jump Ninja

You have one jump, and one shuriken. Use them carefully to conquer 11 platforming levels across a mini hub area !

Controls
  • Right / Left : Move
  • Up : Enter a level (door)
  • Z/W : Jump
  • X : Throw your shuriken
  • -------------------------------
  • R : Restart the level
  • ESC : Exit to hub
  • M : Mute / unmute game

Run into a wall to wall-run ! You can reach great heights without jumping thanks to this move. You can get your jump back by collecting special crystals, and you can grab your shuriken after throwing it

Credits

I made the programming, art and sound. The game is made with Godot Engine.

Font : Kenney (https://kenney.nl/)

Music : Eric Skiff - Undercloaked - Resistor Anthems - Available at https://EricSkiff.com/music

Have fun !
